title: 841 59 "Escape From the Tea Party! Luffy vs. Big Mom!"Transliteration: "Chakai Dasshutsu! Rufi VS Biggu Mamu" (Japanese:茶会脱出!ルフィVSビガ·マム) Kōhei Kureta Kisa Miura June 17, 2018(2018-06-17)
transformers_text: 841 59 Escape From the Tea Party Luffy vs Big Mom Transliteration Chaka i Das shuts u Ru fi VS Big gu M amu Japanese VS K he i Kure ta Kisa Miura June 17 2018 2018 06 17 As Caesar carries Be ge out of the venue the V in smoke Family covers for them During the scuffle Big Mom knocks down Rei ju prompting Luffy and Sanji to leave Be ge's body to defend her as Ichi ji N iji and Yon ji repel any Big Mom Pirate who goes after Caesar When Du Fe ld tries to reclaim the Tamatebako he's struck down by fellow Under wold emperor St uss y whose act ul lay a CP Aig is 0 agent looking to claim the Tamatebako for the World Government She makes sure that Morgan s the bird man 5 president of the World Economy News Paper who is spying on this exchange will blame the theft on Fe ld in his newspaper in exchange for getting to see its contents Unfortunately Du Fled's body pushes the Tamatebako off the roof Luffy briefly clashes with Big Mom before retreating As Big Mom starts chasing Luffy's group Judge battles Big Mom but is quickly defeated
